questions.question: Which of the following is considered a domain where Internet-based data can originate?
The abbreviation IoE stands for which concept?
What type of attack overwhelms a device by draining memory or pushing the CPU to its limits?
What is the definition of a system vulnerability?
options: A threat created intentionally by an attacker
A technique used to carry out an attack
A device or system selected as a target
A flaw that can be exploited by attackers
questions.answer: A flaw that can be exploited by attackers

questions.question: Which attack method relies on numerous compromised machines to overwhelm a single target with traffic?
Name one kind of sensitive information that hackers often attempt to steal from organizations.
questions.answer: Examples: financial records, customer data, medical records, employee information

questions.question: Which two actions are effective in helping defend against cybercriminal activity?
questions.answer: Sharing cybersecurity intelligence, Creating early detection systems

questions.question: What term is used for hackers who conduct attacks to support a political or social cause?
What term describes an inexperienced or beginner hacker?
Which cybersecurity workforce category focuses on analyzing incoming threat data to determine its intelligence value?
